post.subject: Untainted Jade Channel Details
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"Dear Proxy, the Exclusive Channel "Untainted Jade" is coming soon. Signal Search Reception Rate will be boosted for [Qingyi (Stun - Electric)]!

"},{"insert":"[Event Duration]","attributes":{"bold":true}},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"After Version 1.1 Update – 2024/09/04 11:59:59 (server time)

"},{"insert":"[Signal Search Details]","attributes":{"bold":true}},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"• During the event, limited S-Rank Agent Qingyi (Stun - Electric) and A-Rank Agents Billy (Attack - Physical) & Corin (Attack - Physical) have significantly boosted Reception Rates!
※ The limited S-Rank Agent above will not become available in the Star-Studded Cast Stable Channel.
※ This Channel is an Exclusive Channel. The Search count for guaranteed Signals is cumulative across all Exclusive Channels but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Channels.
※ For more information on Signal Searches, please press Details at the bottom-left of the Search page.

"},{"insert":"[The Final Callback - Audition Stage]","attributes":{"bold":true}},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"• Requirements: Reach Inter-Knot Lv. 8, and unlock the Event feature in the Main Story Prologue - Intermission.
• Event Duration: After Version 1.1 Update – 2024/09/04 11:59:59 (server time)
• Event Contents: Proxies can try out Agents Qingyi (Stun - Electric), Billy (Attack - Physical), and Corin (Attack - Physical) in audition stages. Upon clearing the stage for the first time, Proxies can claim rewards on the results screen. 

"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/08/12/0/b12331a70b1bec1c0cb43d119400cc1a_8309442396921012074.png"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"3950305"}},{"insert":"
"}]
